title: Scary Bug, remake wasn't allowed even when teammate was at middle of the fountain since the start.

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

body:
I will even post a video AND a replay file if necessary.
I lost promos because of this game.
The trundle on our team, when he spawned at the VERY START at 0.01, he spawned in the middle like all AFK characters.
Didn't buy a single item, didn't take a single point of dmg or do a single point of dmg to anyone or anything. 
Still lost. Every thing needed for a remake was there and still none was allowed.
I even typed the command at 3mins AND 3.15 it just said "too early to surrender".

Riot, can I please have my LP back

replies.body:
From the look of it, First Blood occurred before the 3 minute mark against your team (the Lucian, Nami and Nocturne killed Ashe at 2:42, according to the stats), which would have disabled /Remake as an option (First Blood against the team with the AFK/DC before 3 minutes will disable the /Remake option).

You can learn more about the /Remake feature by visiting the [/Remake FAQ Support Page](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/208754686).
